```{r libraries, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(knitr)
library(openxlsx)
```


```{r filter-family, echo=FALSE}
#setting current directory as constant
BASE_GLOB = '.'

#importing excel spreadsheet data
pivot_family <- read_excel(
  'LakeVarese_MetaPhlAn_family_scaling.xlsx',
  col_names = TRUE 
  ) %>%
#Turn the table long (placing the scaled value in a column called "relab")
  pivot_longer(-Category,
               names_to= "family",
               values_to= "relab") %>%
#Filter out all variables that contain "noname" (unclassified taxa)
  filter(!grepl(".*noname*", family)) %>%
#Filter out all variables that contain "unclassified" (unclassified taxa)
  filter(!grepl(".*unclassified*", family)) %>%
#Filter out selected variables (Archaea, Eukarya and Viruses families)
    filter(!family %in% c("Baculoviridae", "Eimeriidae", "Methanobacteriaceae", "Methanoregulaceae", "Methanosaetaceae", "Methanosarcinaceae" , "Methanospirillaceae", "Myoviridae" , "Nitrosopumilaceae", "Podoviridae", "Potyviridae", "Siphoviridae")) %>% 
#Re-calculate relative abundance  
  group_by(Category) %>%
  mutate(relab = relab/sum(relab) * 100) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
#Re-convert to wide format and save to excel format (this is the way my colleagues like)  
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = "Category",
    values_from = "relab"
  ) %>%
  write.xlsx('LakeVarese_MetaPhlAn_filtered_family_scaling.xlsx')
  

```

```{r filter-genus, echo=FALSE}

#importing excel spreadsheet data
pivot_genus <- read_excel(
  'LakeVarese_MetaPhlAn_genus_scaling.xlsx',
  col_names = TRUE 
  ) %>%
#Turn the table long (placing the scaled value in a column called "relab")
  pivot_longer(-Category,
               names_to= "genus",
               values_to= "relab") %>%
#Filter out all variables that contain "noname" (unclassified taxa)
  filter(!grepl(".*noname*", genus)) %>%
#Filter out all variables that contain "unclassified" (unclassified taxa)
  filter(!grepl(".*unclassified*", genus)) %>%  
#Filter out selected variables (Archaea, Eukarya and Viruses genera)
    filter(!genus %in% c("Alphabaculovirus", "Bppunalikevirus", "C2likevirus" , "Candidatus_Nitrosoarchaeum" , "Eimeria", "I3likevirus", "Methanobacterium", "Methanobrevibacter", "Methanomethylovorans", "Methanoregulaceae_unclassified", "Methanosaeta", "Methanosarcina", "Methanospirillum" ,"Nitrosopumilaceae_unclassified" , "Nitrosopumilus", "Potyvirus", "Yualikevirus")) %>%
#Re-calculate relative abundance  
  group_by(Category) %>%
  mutate(relab = relab/sum(relab) * 100) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
#Re-convert to wide format and save to excel format (this is the way my colleagues like)  
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = "Category",
    values_from = "relab"
  ) %>%
  write.xlsx('LakeVarese_MetaPhlAn_filtered_genus_scaling.xlsx')
  
```
